-  NSTableView.SelectionHighlightStyle.regular 

Case# NSTableView.SelectionHighlightStyle.regular

macOS

```
case regular
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/SelectionHighlightStyle-swift.enum/regular#Discussion)

The regular highlight style of NSTableView. In OS X v10.7 a light blue (returned by sending `NSColor` a [`alternateSelectedControlColor`](/documentation/appkit/nscolor/alternateselectedcontrolcolor) message) or light gray color (returned by sending NSColor a [`secondarySelectedControlColor`](/documentation/appkit/nscolor/secondaryselectedcontrolcolor) message).
